content.json:
## Applications & Microservices
---
Get best-in-class APM from the category leader. Automatic and intelligent observability at scale for cloud native workloads and enterprise apps helps you ensure end-to-end hybrid cloud distributed tracing, optimize service performance, innovate faster, collaborate efficiently, and deliver more value with less effort.

content.query:
DynatraceProblems_CL 
| summarize  arg_max(startTime_d, *) by problemId_s
| summarize count() by severityLevel_s
| render piechart
content.title: Problems By Severity

content.json:
## Application Security
---
Empower DevSecOps at scale with a unique approach to securing cloud-native applications at runtime combined with intelligent automation.

content.query:
DynatraceAttacks_CL 
| summarize  arg_max(timestamp_d, *) by attackId_s 
| summarize count() by attackType_s 
| render piechart
content.title: Attacks By Attack Type

content.json:
## Tenant Auditing
---
Audit logs are crucial for tracking changes and security-relevant events. Dynatrace can log such events so that you can review important changes: when the change was made, by whom, and what was changed.

content.query:
DynatraceAuditLogs_CL 
| summarize  arg_max(timestamp_d, *) by logId_s 
| where Category in ("WEB_UI","TOKEN")
| summarize count() by Operation=strcat(eventType_s , "-" , Category)
| render piechart
content.title: Audit Events By Type
